author: Tiredofit
content: I am an old grunt. How the US Navy can co tinier to Sun I to ships around the world is as difficult to believe as a chopper flying into a landing airliner. WTH is going on? What happens in a real shooting war?

author: D. Peter Boucher
content:
Here again is the problem with commercial vessels meeting up with military vessels. Often it seems, thinking back on my own 50 year career, that military vessels seem to think that they can ignore the Rules of the Road. Perhaps even more concerning is that they do not know them !!

There is no reason, in the conditions mentioned in this post, that the military AIS is not in use.
